content: **a cute and cozy keyhole scarf with intricate looking stitch pattern ** > **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** child adult - length = 33 38 /85 96 5 cm width = 6 5 8 / 16 5 20 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet working in the back loop only special stitch instructions for a v_stitch and beginning double_crochet **yarn ** #4 worsted weight tippy tree yarns hand dyed 100% superwash merino wool or suitable substitute 240 290 yards total **tools ** us size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
